Reviews.Title: “Great deal in a Great location.”
Reviews.Author: lovely090
Reviews.Content: stayed beverly inn motel 5 nights stay location amazing pretty central la lots nearby farmers market grove shopping lacma surrounding fairfax district lots interior design shops vintage clothes shops theres buses los feliz silver lake blocks north handy staff friendly help taxis etc couldnt recommend hotel recommended friends ours stay look beverly inn dont believe reviews experience self

Reviews.Title: “Great Value, Met every Expectation!”

Reviews.Content: friend stayed hotel concert el rey theater expected price location parking wasnt bad front desk called cab ride theater decent bed clean sheets complain lack seals door pretty hear outside reason people decided 700am hang balcony talk loudly besides risers definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Front Desk Was Totally Awesome!!!!”

Reviews.Content: motel ritz carlton looking value location safe neighborhood youve chosen street cbs studios line price corner son stayed week received service maids front desk front desk helpful concierge seen wonderful hard family la definitely stay beverly inn friendly service

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: heatherh15
Reviews.Content: picked beverly inn seen online close cbs studio shuttle hotel walking distance arriving location hotel perfect directly street cbs studio checked wait 10minutes finish getting cleaned evening noticed ac wasnt following day switched owners nice helpful werent super fancy shouldnt expect 75 simple updates met recomend staying cbs studio farmers market nice souveniers bite eat reasonable price tip traveling car check metro stops
